name: student-placement-assistant
description: MERN stack app to help students prepare for job placements using AI

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.render-build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install --include=dev && echo VITE_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID > .env && npm run build
